text:
—The volcanic planet, Garunderra.
Its surface is home to many active and dormant volcanoes.

Seismic and volcanic activity is vigorous throughout the planet,
and in some areas, lava flows and volcanic ash cover the surface—

However, in regions where such volcanic activity is relatively stable,
the inhabitants have built communities in coexistence with the volcanoes.

name: Ryusei
text:
...Oh!
[Player]-san,
we've arrived at our destination!

name: reXer
text:
Oh, so this is Garunderra!
Just as I heard,
it's a peaceful place.

name: Hitomi
text:
It was quite a long journey from Earth, wasn't it?
...Ah, the air is clear and feels great!
[Player] landed on Garunderra with the Choco Hunters.

Then, they activated the filming drone handed to them
by the staff in the ship, and signaled the hunters.

name: Hitomi
text:
—Yes, and so!
We've arrived at the volcanic planet, Garunderra!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's a very pleasant place—!
The air is so clean here,
I bet training would be very effective!

name: reXer
text:
Alright, then to make the phantom chocolate by hand,
so first we need to find the ingredients... is that right?

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's right.
But first, let's show the viewers
the scenery of this planet!

name: reXer
text:
Eh, oh, yeah, that's right!
...Unexpectedly, there are also plants growing!

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right!
As it's a planet under development,
it's a planet full of nature!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's completely different from Earth, isn't it?
And this planet is warm—.
It's almost enough to make me sweat.

name: Hitomi
text:
Oh, and look—!
It seems the whole village is decorated!

name: Ryusei
text:
You're right, I wonder if they know we're coming?
I'm looking forward to going there—!

[Player] operated the drone.
And towards the camera,
the hunters began to speak with smiles.

One of the staff members, confirming this,
quietly approached [Player].

And, without saying a word,
handed [Player] a message card.

And the moment [Player] received the card,
the staff ran off at full speed.

name: reXer
text: —W-What's wrong, [Player]?

Despite being in the middle of filming,
the hunters also turned their gaze towards [Player],
who gasped in surprise.

At the end of their gaze was the staff member running
at full speed towards the spaceship they came in, and—

The small spaceship for the location shoot,
which had brought [Player] and the others,
suddenly had its engine roared.

name: Hitomi
text:
...Eh, no way!?
O-Our spaceship...!

name: reXer
text:
T-This way, we'll be left behind...!
What about the staff member!?

name: Ryusei
text:
The staff member who just ran inside was with us, right!?
So that means...

In the middle of Ryusei's sentence,
the spaceship flew high into the air and departed as it was.

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahaha, they got us, didn't they!
"We can only rely on the guide we meet
for the first time on site," they said.

name: Hitomi
text:
Eh, s-seriously,
did the staff really go back!?

options.text: The staff member gave it to me.

text:
To the bewildered hunters from the sudden turn of events,
[Player] opened the handed card.
On it was a message addressed to the Choco Hunters.

name: Card
text:
—"Mission"—
"Find the local guide based on the hints!"

name: Card
text:
"Hints:"
"To get rock cacao..."
"The village's best ○○ craftsman"

name: Three People
text: M-Mission...!?

Chapter 2:
Always-noisy Days

The three hunters and [Player]
were left behind at the village entrance.

Ryusei looked at the message card
in his hand and smiled faintly.

name: Ryusei
text:
They pranked us again, didn't they?
I was surprised at the studio too,
but this location shoot is tough.

name: Hitomi
text:
Hmm, it was surprising...
I even think there might be more to come—

name: reXer
text:
...No, in that case,
we should complete this mission quickly, right?

name: reXer
text: If necessary, I'll go scout the village first—

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, it's alright, reXer-san!
The program directors didn't truly abandon us.

name: Ryusei
text:
I think they want to make things a little
difficult to get an interesting "shot".
It's typical of NeoTalents' projects.

name: reXer
text:
I-Is that how it works...?
.........
reXer muttered softly and looked down in thought.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, ah...
No, my bad, it's nothing.
I was just thinking.

name: reXer
text:
...Actually, I don't have much experience with live location shoots yet.
It's very different from virtual reality...

name: reXer
text:
Since I only used to record game streams,
I'm still confident in action and commentary, but...

name: Ryusei
text:
If that's the case,
it might be best to just relax and take it easy, don't you think?

name: Ryusei
text:
This shoot will probably be a long one.
Of course, Hito-chan and I will support you too!

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right!
The journey has just begun, so
let's enjoy it!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, thank you, both of you.
.........

reXer shook his head slightly,
and began to walk as if he is changing his mindset.

name: reXer
text: Alright, then let's start exploring the village again!

name: reXer
text: [Player], start the camera!
Operating the drone, [Player] signaled the hunters.

name: Hitomi
text:
—It seems the staff have left, but...
We can't just mope around!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, it seems we have no choice but to gather
information from the villagers and look for the guide.

name: Ryusei
text: Alright, then let's go greet the villagers right away!

Nodding at Ryusei's words,
the three proceeded into the village.
And, waiting for the group in the village was—

name: Villagers
text:
Welcome—!!
Choco Hunters!!
We've been waiting for you—!

name: Villagers
text:
Thank you for coming all the way to this countryside with only mines—!!
Please, make yourselves at home!

name: Villagers
text:
You're celebrities from Earth, aren't you—!
Please take a picture with us—!
My family are huge fans—!

The villagers came out and waved flags and
their hands towards [Player] and the others.

There were also stalls and food stands,
and many people gathered to welcome them,
making it a village-wide celebration.

name: reXer
text:
...Th-this is an amazing
welcome...!

name: Ryusei
text:
That's right—!
It seems they were waiting for us!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, what a wonderful welcome—!
It's like a festival!

name: Hitomi
text:
There seem to be a lot of shops too!
We're in the middle of filming, but let's check them out later!
...Oh, and look!

Where Hitomi pointed,
Earthlings who were not locals could also be seen.

name: Earthling Fan
text:
—Kyaa—!!
Ryusei-sama—!
You're wonderful~~~!!!

name: Earthling Fan
text:
Hito-chan—!!
Look this way—!!

name: Earthling Fan
text:
reXer—!
Show us your signature pose, show us—!!

name: Hitomi
text:
Could it be that they came all the way from Earth
to support ChocoFull!?

name: reXer
text:
W-Willingly from Earth!?
Garunderra is quite far,
I think...

options.text: Th-they're quite passionate fans, aren't they...
They're like Mokdai at a hero show.

text:
reXer, who received intense cheers, flinched a little,
but responded to his fans by raising his hand.

name: Hitomi
text:
To be cheered on like this...
This is truly "love"!
My spirits are soaring!

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, that's wonderful!
We have to do our best for the people who support us!

name: reXer
text:
Th-that's right!
We too, will respond to this love!

name: Hitomi
text:
That's the spirit, reXer-san!
Let's prepare a proper return for the love shown to us later!
Hitomi happily smiled and waved, providing fan service.

Ryusei also smiled and struck a pose,
and each time, the audience cheered loudly.

name: reXer
text:
...The two of them are used to it, aren't they?
I need to be more—

reXer muttered softly, a voice no one could hear,
as he gazed at Hitomi and Ryusei's backs.

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right, since so many people are supporting us,
why don't we talk to some of them?

name: Hitomi
text: Perhaps someone knows the answer to the mission!

name: Ryusei
text: Good idea, let's ask if anyone knows about this hint.

name: reXer
text:
But, it's just a hint,
"the village's best ○○ craftsman".
What goes in the ○○...?

name: Ryusei
text:
I'm also curious about
the other keyword, "rock cacao".

name: Hitomi
text:
It's rock, after all...
I feel like it doesn't connect with chocolate or cacao...

options.text: I feel like there aren't enough hints...

text:
The four sighed softly.
reXer crossed his arms and muttered
as if he was looking for a clue.

name: reXer
text:
For now, should we just look for a craftsman?
But if we don't know what kind of craftsman, we can't ask...

name: Hitomi
text: Then, why don't we investigate the rock cacao first?

name: Hitomi
text:
I'm sure it's related to getting
that cacao and some kind of craftsman.

name: Ryusei
text:
Yeah, I agree!
First, let's ask the villagers about it!

name: Ryusei
text:
Alright... excuse me—!
Is there anyone here who knows about rock cacao—?

Ryusei smiled and waved both hands
as he went to ask the residents.

name: Boy
text:
"Rock cacao"...!
I know about it!

A boy reacted to Ryusei's voice
and raised his hand straight up.

name: Ryusei
text:
Oh!
It seems we're about to get
some valuable information right away!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hello, I'm Ryusei.
If you don't mind, could you tell me
what you know about this "rock cacao"?

Ryusei squatted down,
matching the boy's eye level,
and smiled gently.

name: Boy
text:
...Um, brothers,
you don't know about rock cacao?
It's super delicious!

name: Boy
text:
It's super hard and can't be eaten raw, so
you heat it until it turns bright red,
and melt it so you can eat it.

name: Ryusei
text:
Ohh, is that so!
Where can I find that rock cacao?

name: Boy
text:
It's buried in the ground!
Because it's "rock" cacao, you know!
You dig it up like a big stone.

name: Hitomi
text:
Buried in the ground, you say?
Is it something like a potato?

name: reXer
text:
Hmm, since it's called cacao,
I thought it was a tree nut...

name: Ryusei
text: But, you mine it like ore, right...?

name: Ryusei
text:
What we imagined
might be completely different.

The three cried out in surprise at the
difference in their image of rock cacao.
[Player] pointed the camera at their expressions.

name: reXer
text:
If that's the case, then the hint earlier...
It means something needed to get things
buried in the ground, right?

name: Ryusei
text:
It means mining tools, doesn't it.
A craftsman who makes tools, perhaps?

name: Hitomi
text:
It would hurt to use your bare hands, wouldn't it?
In that case, drills or pickaxes...
And shovels too!

name: reXer
text:
..."Bare hands"?
No, well, whatever...

name: reXer
text:
Pickaxes and shovels...
In a game, blacksmiths would craft them...

name: All Three
text: "Blacksmith"!

name: Ryusei
text:
Thank you, thanks to you
we might be able to clear the mission!

The three, shouting happily, faced the boy and thanked him,
then stood up and addressed the other villagers.

name: Hitomi
text:
—Excuse me—!
Is there anyone living in this village
who is a blacksmith—!

name: reXer
text:
We're looking for the village's best blacksmith!
Please tell us if you have any information!
At the three's calls, the residents also cheered loudly.

name: Hitomi
text:
—This is the blacksmith's workshop
the villagers were talking about.

name: reXer
text:
...Ah, we finally found it!
Come on, let's go meet the village's best blacksmith right away!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, reXer-kun.
The camera's this way.

name: reXer
text:
Eh, ah...!
Th-this drone, huh!

reXer, who had been posing with a determined look for
the sound-gathering drone, turned back in a hurry.

And while he awkwardly scratched his head,
the workshop door opened.

name: Ganran
text:
—Oh, I heard voices,
so I came out, and it's a "hit"!

options.text: He's someone overflowing with an adult's charm...!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Ganran
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gahahaha!
You're trying to flirt with me right after we met, huh?

dialogue_after_selection.name: reXer
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...H-hey, [Player],
we're filming right now.
It's being live-streamed, you know?

name: Hitomi
text:
Hello!
Are you the blacksmith?

name: Ryusei
text: We're here for the ChocoFull shoot!

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, I heard about it!
You're the Choco Hunters, right?
Alright, just a moment...

name: reXer
text:
Hm...?
What's wrong...?

The man rummaged in his pocket,
and took out what looked like a piece of paper.

He hid it in his palm,
glanced at it, and began to speak.

name: Ganran
text:
—Um, let's see...?
'Well done for finding me, Choco Hunters!'

name: Ganran
text:
'The village's best blacksmith... ahem!
Ah, ...a blacksmith, craftsman, that is.
I'm the village's best blacksmith!'

name: Ganran
text: Ehh, what does it say... 'If you want me to be your village guide, show me your skills!'... that's what it says!

options.text: ...He's clearly reading from a script, isn't he?
It's obvious, but is that okay...?

text: The man, claiming to be a blacksmith, read up to that point, then feigned crossing his arms and smiled proudly.

name: Hitomi
text: It seems he is indeed the guide!

name: reXer
text: Ah, but if you say show our skills, what should we do?

name: Ganran
text:
Well, of course, it's a battle!
—Operator-san, transform!

As soon as he announced that, as if there was a remote operator,
light overflowed from the terminal and enveloped his body.

And after the light subsided,
a man clad in a hero suit and a large chain stood imposingly.
At [Player]'s signal, the hunters nodded in response.

And, [Player] proceeded to transform
the three into heroes, one after another.

name: Ryusei
text:
The craftsman is a hero too!
Alright, if we're going to battle,
it's time for my muscles to shine!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Ah, my biceps,
they're beautifully defined today...!

name: Ryusei
text:
Hahah, thank you!
I'll fight with my physique-trained body—!

name: reXer
text:
Alright, a battle is easier for me anyway.
Time to redeem my honor as a cyber hero!

name: Hitomi
text: Heheh, let's make it a battle that the viewers will enjoy too!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
That's a good spirit!

name: Ganran
text:
Iron Rule, number one!
'If you're going to do it, do it with all your might!'

name: Ganran
text:
Come at me with all you've got, so you don't get hurt!
—Alright, here I come!
Battle Start

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
Well, you showed me good guts!
I've definitely seen your skills!

name: Ganran
text:
Again, I'm Ganran, the guide!
Nice to meet you, Hunters!

Ganran, who had finished the battle,
crumpled the script in his hand and grinned.
Seeing that, [Player] also de-transformed the heroes.

name: reXer
text:
Ah, you too. I'm reXer.
That was a nice game.
Ganran is strong!

name: Ryusei
text:
And his muscles are very powerful, aren't they—!
I'm almost envious—!

name: Ryusei
text:
Ah, I'm Ryusei.
I'd be happy if you called me Ryusei!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
Thank you, I'm a hero too!
I train hard every day!

name: Hitomi
text:
So that's the result of your daily training!
I'm Ayauta Hitomi!
Please call me Hito-chan!

name: Ganran
text:
reXer, and Ryusei, and
Hito-chan, and [Player]...
Alright, I've got it!

name: Ganran
text:
You all seem to be entertainers!
It's my first time recording a show, but
well, you can leave the guiding to me!

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, that's right.
Since you've come all this way, I might as well introduce it!
This is my workshop.

Ganran opened the door from which he had emerged earlier, revealing the interior.
Inside, various farming tools and weapons were lined up.

name: Ganran
text:
It might not be very familiar to you,
but I'm a blacksmith.
My job is to forge metal!

name: Ganran
text:
Axes, hoes, knives, whatever you want,
just tell me and I'll forge it for you!

name: Ryusei
text:
A blacksmith, huh?
It's my first time seeing an actual workshop!

name: Hitomi
text: It's my first time meeting a blacksmith too.

name: Hitomi
text:
Simple tools can be 3D-printed,
but handmade tools from scratch are wonderful!

name: reXer
text:
Indeed, traditional methods of crafting tools
were something I had only seen in games.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, I hear that's how it is too.
But tools that are closely tied to daily life
benefit from fine adjustments, don't they?

name: Ganran
text:
Besides, you can't just print everything.
Especially on a developing planet like Garunderra.

name: Ganran
text:
I've just been continuing the methods I learned long ago, but now
I'm being called a craftsman, that's how it is.

Ganran poked his head into the workshop
and asked [Player] and the others.

name: Ganran
text:
...Speaking of which, do you
all know about rock cacao?

name: Hitomi
text:
Oh, yes!
We learned a lot from the villagers!

name: Ryusei
text:
It's really buried in the ground,
and you dig it up before cooking it, right?
I still can't imagine it, but...

name: Ganran
text:
Yeah, that's right. Then we're making quick progress!
To dig up rock cacao, you use these.

Ganran brought out pickaxes for everyone
from the workshop and spread them out.

And then, with his backhand, he pointed
to the giant mountain soaring behind them.

name: Ganran
text:
See, there's a big mountain behind us, right?
That mountain is where rock cacao can be found,
so it's called "Choco Volcano".

name: Ganran
text:
From tomorrow, we'll climb that and dig for it!
Be prepared!

name: Ganran
text: Yeah, have you ever climbed a mountain?

name: Ganran
text:
Compared to normal mountains,
it might be a little hot, though!

name: Ryusei
text:
Climbing a volcano, huh—
Sounds like good training!

name: Ryusei
text:
Before climbing, we need to make sure
to warm up properly—!

name: Hitomi
text:
Ugh... I heard it was a volcanic planet,
so I kind of expected it, but...

name: Hitomi
text:
We're really climbing it, aren't we!?
If my makeup runs from sweat...
Ah, what should I do...

name: reXer
text:
M-makeup worries...?
Aren't there other things to worry about,
as it seems to be quite a mountain path...?

name: Hitomi
text:
Boo—, reXer-san!
For an idol, makeup is a very important matter!

name: reXer
text:
I-is that so...!
Th-that's, uh, my bad...
Ryusei, are you also concerned about that kind of thing?

reXer turned back, and his eyes caught sight of
Ryusei talking to his own thigh muscles.

name: Ryusei
text:
Mmm, what firmness...!
With this, I can play a big role
in mountain climbing too...!

name: reXer
text:
.........
No, I knew it, but...
Your warm-up is too early, isn't it!?

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
No need to worry!
Well, don't overdo it, though!

name: Ganran
text:
Besides, you all came all the way
from Earth to Garunderra, didn't you?

name: Ganran
text:
Thanks for the long journey!
I'll guide you to the hotel where you'll be staying from today,
so please follow me!

name: Ganran
text:
It's the best hotel in the village!
Get a good rest, and prepare for tomorrow!

Ganran gathered the pickaxes and led the way
through the village, walking ahead of the group.
And then, the most luxurious building in the village came into view.

Passing through the entrance, which resembled a resort hotel,
laughter could be heard from the reception desk at the back.

—Gahahaha!
To think so many unknown ores have gathered here!

name: Obsidius
text:
—Oh!?
[Player]!
What a coincidence!

name: Obsidius
text:
Gahahaha!
To think we'd meet again here!
I'm even more pumped up now!

options.text: It's been a while since Aquas!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, that's right!
It's been a while since then, but—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Could it be that you came all this way because you wanted to see me?
...Just kidding! Wahaha!

name: reXer
text:
So you're [Player]'s acquaintance.
Nice to meet you.

name: Obsidius
text:
Oops, my apologies for the late introduction.
I am Obsidius, a mineralogist hero belonging to Heroic Educators.

name: Obsidius
text:
I had a connection with [Player] before
and we worked together, but...

Saying that, Obsidius got a good look at the members
of the group and nodded in understanding.

name: Obsidius
text:
...Ah, I see.
I've heard about it, you're the "Choco Hunters", aren't you?

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha!
You all are already the talk of the town!

name: Hitomi
text:
Wow, you know about ChocoFull!
Thank you!

name: Ryusei
text:
We came to this planet to
make the phantom chocolate by hand.

name: Obsidius
text:
I see, so with the filming drone, [Player] is the cameraman.
Once again, I look forward to working with you!
Ganran and the hunters exchanged greetings with Obsidius.

name: Obsidius
text:
It's being recorded right now, isn't it.
Still, it's an amazing program to rent out an entire volcano!

name: Obsidius
text:
Ah, I'm staying in Garunderra to investigate
the geology and minerals of the volcanic belt—

name: Obsidius
text:
The program staff contacted me very politely
asking for my cooperation with the filming.
I heard about it then.

name: Obsidius
text:
Nevertheless, this planet is full of unknown minerals, so it's the best I can ask for!
Everywhere I dig, it's a continuous stream of new discoveries!

Obsidius took out sparkling ores he had just collected
from his pouch and showed them to [Player] and the others.

name: Ganran
text:
Oh, you got something good!
I'm a blacksmith.
I don't know about stones, but—

name: Ganran
text:
I also collect metal materials.
If you want some, I might be able to give you a bit, how about it?

name: Obsidius
text:
Oh, really!?
That's exciting!
Tell me about it after the recording is over!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, it's surprising how you
find common interests, isn't it!?

name: reXer
text: Ah, Obsidius really loves minerals!

name: Ryusei
text:
...Wait, but if it's a volcanic survey,
maybe we're causing trouble because of our filming...?

name: reXer
text:
That's right, NeoTalents is renting it out, aren't they?
Isn't there an entry restriction?

name: Obsidius
text:
Gahahaha!
You don't have to worry about that at all,
because I'm just one person.

name: Obsidius
text:
I've already collected as much as I could
before the filming's entry restrictions began!
The bag Obsidius was carrying on his back was heavy with its contents.

options.text: So that's why you're dressed like that, huh?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ah, it's easy to move around in and perfect for collecting minerals in the mountains, right?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When I'm doing fieldwork in warm places,
I usually wear this outfit!

options.text: That outfit looks great on you!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Gahahaha!
I'm happy to hear you praise it, but
it's just a mountain climbing club uniform from my university, you know?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I got it when I offered to help them with mountain climbing during my fieldwork.
They even put in original embroidery!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Obsidius
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I like this kind of outfit, so
I don't mind at all!
Thank you, [Player]!

name: Obsidius
text:
My collecting activities at the volcano are mostly done,
and I got a great haul of rare samples!

name: Obsidius
text:
I was so eager to investigate that I ran back, so you don't have to worry about me.
No matter how much time I have, I can never finish researching!

name: Ryusei
text:
Sorry, thank you!
That really helps us too!

name: Hitomi
text:
That's right, so that we don't cause any trouble,
let's gather the rock cacao quickly!

name: Obsidius
text:
Oh, rock cacao. That's particularly interesting!
You might already know this, but it's an edible mineral!

name: reXer
text:
...Eh, "edible mineral"?
Is it really a "mineral"?
Not like a plant that's hard like a rock?

name: Obsidius
text:
Ah, that's right?
Its composition is genuinely rock, but
it's surprisingly "edible" and "delicious"!

name: Obsidius
text:
I got so excited that I thought I had no choice but to investigate it thoroughly,
so I immediately came to the site to research it—

name: Obsidius
text: But it's quite rare, so I haven't gotten my hands on any yet.

name: Ganran
text:
Ah, that's right.
I've barely seen a real one myself, you know.

name: Ryusei
text:
S-such a rare thing,
will we really find it...?

name: reXer
text:
It's a rare material, huh...
Hearing that gets me fired up!
I'll definitely find it!

name: Obsidius
text:
Gahahaha!
Good enthusiasm, I don't dislike it!
Your program's recording seems like it'll be interesting too!

name: Obsidius
text:
Make sure to leave some rock cacao for me, okay?
...Just kidding!
Laughing heartily, Obsidius readjusted his bag.

name: Obsidius
text:
I'll probably be cooped up in this hotel
doing research from now on, but
I'll be sure to watch the program!

name: Obsidius
text:
Good luck, Hunters!
And, do your best, [Player]!
See ya!

Obsidius laughed and waved,
then proceeded down the hallway.

name: Hitomi
text:
He was a very wild person, wasn't he!
And he taught us a lot about rock cacao!

name: reXer
text:
Ah, a mineralogist is a professional
when it comes to rocks, after all.
We got a good hint!

name: Ganran
text:
Gahahaha, that's good!
From tomorrow, you'll be climbing the mountain
properly in search for it!

name: Ryusei
text:
Choco Volcano, right!
I'm looking forward to climbing the volcano!

name: Hitomi
text:
Heheh, well then,
let's do our best from tomorrow!

name: All
text: Oh—!!

At [Player]'s signal, the drone stopped filming,
and the hunters also relaxed.

The four laughed and applauded each other,
having successfully finished the first day's recording.
However—

name: reXer
text:
.........
Tomorrow, surely...

A small, almost exhaled murmur,
was swallowed by the applause.
